channel.title: Science on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Science on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: AI therapy bots fuel delusions and give dangerous advice, Stanford study finds
item.description: Popular chatbots serve as poor replacements for human therapists, but study authors call for nuance.

item.title: Rocket Report: SpaceX to make its own propellant; China’s largest launch pad
item.description: United Launch Alliance begins stacking its third Vulcan rocket for the second time.

item.title: In the Southwest, solar panels can help both photovoltaics and crops
item.description: Solar arrays can shade crops from sun while moisture cools the panels to increase their productivity.

item.title: In the Southwest, solar panels in can help both photovoltaics and crops
item.description: Solar arrays can shade crops from sun while moisture cools the panels to increase their productivity.

item.title: It’s hunting season in orbit as Russia’s killer satellites mystify skywatchers
item.description: “Once more, we play our dangerous game—a game of chess—against our old adversary.”
